content: **drops crochet blanket in snow made of 6-edged panels** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ width approx 127 cm / 50 length approx 162 cm / 63 ¾ at longest point materials drops snow from garnstudio color alternative -1 500 g color no 40 brown mix 250 g color no 08 red 200 g color no 07 orange 200 g color no 10 plumb 150 g color no 26 rose 150 g color no 33 red mix 100 g color no 04 purple color alternative -2 500 g color no 23 mole brown 250 g color no 01 off white 250 g color no 21 jeans blue 200 g color no 12 light blue 200 g color no 13 light beige 100 g color no 15 navy drops crochet hook size 10 mm / us n/15 or size needed to obtain the correct crochet gauge
